caller_intent: Pat Littleton wants to cancel his business owner policy effective September 15th because he is selling his embroidery business and does not need coverage after the sale closes.
resolution_steps: Agent confirms Mayberry Embroidery's active business owner policy.
Agent offers to send a cancellation form via email for Pat to sign.
Agent provides Pat's email address (192@MayberryEmbroidery.com) and confirms it is on file.
Agent commits to sending the cancellation form immediately.
Agent asks if Pat needs anything else, which Pat declines.
knowledge_required: Handling policy cancellations during business transitions
summary: Pat Littleton from Mayberry Embroidery requested cancellation of his business insurance policy effective September 15th, as he is selling his business. The agent confirmed the active policy, sent a cancellation form via email, and closed the call after confirming no further assistance was needed.
